comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown when new a data source after close and reopen the 
properties sheet.

Steps to reproduce:
1.New a blank report
2.Click the properties sheet then click the layout
3.Close the properties sheet and reopen it
4.Click the layout again
5.New a JDBC data source in Data Explorer,click OK
6.Open the data source edit box and click test connection,then close it
7.New a dataset, click Finish button

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
"Widget is disposed" is reported after step 5.
A wrong dataset will be created each time you click Finish button in step 7.
Close the report file and reopen it, syntax errors will be reported

Exception Description:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3349)

This happens when the property sheet page tree disposed.
Add check to determin if the refresh is needed.
